node_type.value: Choose an environment from the list to edit its variables

value.value: flex justify-end gap-2 p-4 border-t border-[#3c3c3c]

handlers.name: handleSetActive
handleAddEnvironment
handleDeleteEnvironment
handleUpdateVariable

calls.name: onEnvironmentsChange
environments.map

handlers.name: handleAddVariable

calls.name: onEnvironmentsChange
environments.map
arguments:
env =>
        env.id === envId
          ? { ...env, variables: [...env.variables, createKeyValuePair()] }
          : env

handlers.name: handleDeleteVariable

calls.name: onEnvironmentsChange
environments.map
arguments:
env =>
        env.id === envId
          ? { ...env, variables: env.variables.filter((_, i) => i !== varIndex) }
          : env

handlers.name: handleRenameEnvironment

calls.name: onEnvironmentsChange
environments.map
arguments:
env =>
        env.id === envId ? { ...env, name: newName } : env
